alert.note: Alert for Russell; Scott; Washington; Wise (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:17PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Russell, northeastern Scott, west central Washington and southeastern Wise Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 317 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Trammel, or 12 miles southeast of Wise, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Cleveland Va, Coeburn, St. Paul, Nickelsville, Dungannon, Collingwood, Castlewood, Hansonville and Benhams. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
